original_text: After he said that, Jotham ran away to Beer. He lived there because he was afraid of his brother, Abimelech.
korean_text: 요담이 그의 형제 아비멜렉 앞에서 도망하여 피해서 브엘로 가서 거기에 거주하니라

sentences.original_text: because he was afraid of his brother, Abimelech
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 형제 아비멜렉이 두려웠기 때문입니다
